title: The Healthcare Energy Revolution in Tanzania
excerpt: How renewable energy is transforming healthcare delivery across Tanzania, reducing costs by up to TZS 3.2M monthly and improving patient outcomes.

title: Why Preventive Maintenance Saves Lives
excerpt: The critical importance of regular medical equipment maintenance in healthcare facilities and how it impacts patient safety.

excerpt: Exploring how technology is revolutionizing healthcare delivery in Tanzania, from patient booking to equipment management.
